pose.stance: Strong, confident stance with relaxed dominance
pose.leg_position: Weight shifted to one hip to emphasize curves and muscular legs
pose.arm_position: Both arms raised with elbows bent, hands holding bikini straps
pose.torso_orientation: Facing the camera with a slight torso twist to maximize waist-to-bust contrast
pose.head_position: Slight tilt adding softness to an otherwise powerful pose
pose.pose_intent: Fierce, seductive, and empowered high-fashion fitness pose
